"Moana slow down

Moana don't drown"

Can you drown at the call of the sea?

Aue, aue

we used to sail to distant islands
A thousand years ago,
Maui spoke to the sea

There's gotta be more
I know there's more, there's always more
I'm gonna break through, and find something new
I'm gonna find more

There's gotta be more
I know there's more, there's always more
One day I'll decide to roll with the tide
And I'm gonna see

Moana stand tall

I will see what's on the other side

Moana stand proud

I will go where no one's ever been before

entry.title: Lin-Manuel_Miranda - Unstoppable (Outtake) - 가사
entry.content:

Though he was no bigger than you or me as a baby

We were crawling on the ground

Maui taught us how to see the waves

Te-P？...

and with the disappearance of Maui came the end of our voyages
